privacy.intro: Welcome to TimeTrails . We value your privacy and data security. This policy aims to clearly and readably explain how we handle your information under the principles of default minimal collection , local-first processing , and user control .
privacy.lastUpdated.label: Last updated:
privacy.meta.description: TimeTrails Privacy Policy and Data Practices.
privacy.meta.title: TimeTrails Privacy Policy | Privacy Policy
privacy.og.description: How we collect, use, and protect your data.
privacy.og.title: TimeTrails Privacy Policy
privacy.section.changes.p: We may update this policy to reflect changes in features or regulations. Significant changes will be prompted in the app or on this page, and the 'Last Updated' date will be updated.
privacy.section.changes.title: Changes
privacy.section.collect.items.0: Location information (optional): used to record your travel routes, stop points, and map visualization. Permissions: NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription, NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescription.
privacy.section.collect.items.1: Sports and Fitness (Optional): Used for more accurate determination of movement status and mileage statistics. Permission: NSMotionUsageDescription.
privacy.section.collect.items.2: Photo Access (Optional): Used when you choose to import or associate photos. Permissions: NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription, NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription.
privacy.section.collect.items.3: Notifications (Optional) : Used for interactive reminders (e.g., completion records, sync status).
privacy.section.collect.items.4: Crash and Diagnostic Data (Optional): If you agree to share diagnostic information through system settings or TestFlight, we may receive anonymous crash logs to improve stability.
privacy.section.collect.title: What information do we collect
privacy.section.contact.dev: 上海树下小屋网络科技有限公司
privacy.section.contact.emailNote: (For inquiries or to exercise your rights, please contact us via email)
privacy.section.contact.title: Contact Us
privacy.section.kids.p: This application is intended for the general public and is not designed for children. If you believe we have collected information from children without parental consent, please contact us for resolution.
privacy.section.kids.title: Children's Privacy
privacy.section.rights.items.0: Access and Export : View and export your data (such as GPX/CSV, if provided) within the app.
privacy.section.rights.items.1: Correction and Deletion : Edit or delete your records, tracks, and media associations.
privacy.section.rights.items.2: Permission Control : You can withdraw location, motion, photo, and other permissions at any time in iOS settings.
privacy.section.rights.items.3: Different regional regulations: We respect applicable laws (such as GDPR/CCPA). To exercise your rights, please contact the email below.
privacy.section.rights.title: Your Rights
privacy.section.storage.items.0: Local First: Trajectory data is stored locally on your device by default.
privacy.section.storage.items.1: Sync optional: If you enable iCloud Sync or self-built server, data will be encrypted and transmitted to the respective service according to your choice for multi-device use.
privacy.section.storage.items.2: retention period : You can delete data within the app; we do not retain a separate copy of your personal data outside the app.
privacy.section.storage.title: Data Storage and Retention
privacy.section.third.p: The app may use services provided by Apple (such as iCloud, system location, etc.). These services are governed by their respective terms and privacy policies. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
privacy.section.third.title: Third Party Services
privacy.section.use.items.0: Generate and present tracks, statistics, and map visualizations locally on the device.
privacy.section.use.items.1: (Optional) Used to keep data consistent between your devices when you enable iCloud/private server synchronization.
privacy.section.use.items.2: Improve application performance, stability, and user experience (e.g., fixes based on anonymous crash logs).
privacy.section.use.title: How We Use Information
